block_domain.title: %s တစ်ခုလုံးကို ဘလော့လုပ်ရန် တကယ် သေချာပါသလား? များသောအားဖြင့် အနည်းစုကို ပစ်မှတ်ထား ဘလော့လုပ်ခြင်းသည် လုံလောက်ပါသည်။ ထို ဒိုမိန်းမှ အကြောင်းအရာ တစ်ခုမှ မြင်ရမည်မဟုတ်သည့်အပြင် ထို ဒိုမိန်းတွင်ရှိသော သင်၏ စောင့်ကြည့်သူများပါ ဖယ်ရှားပစ်မည်ဖြစ်သည်။

translation_failed.message: Translation failed. Maybe the administrator has not enabled translations on this server or this server is running an older version of Mastodon where translations are not yet supported.

mastodon.title: Welcome to Mastodon
mastodon.description: Mastodon is a decentralized social network, meaning no single company controls it. It’s made up of many independently-run servers, all connected together.

servers.title: What are servers?
servers.description: Every Mastodon account is hosted on a server — each with its own values, rules, & admins. No matter which one you pick, you can follow and interact with people on any server.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: သင်၏အကောင့်ဖွင့်ခဲ့သော ဆာဗာပေါ်တွင် လော့ခ်အင်ဝင်ရောက်ပါ

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Although the Mastodon app does not collect any data, the server you sign up through may have a different policy. Take a minute to review and agree to the Mastodon app privacy policy and your server’s privacy policy.

footer.mastodon_description: Mastodon is open source software. You can report issues on GitHub at %s (%s)

report.title: Report %s
report.content1: Are there any other posts you’d like to add to the report?
report.content2: Is there anything the moderators should know about this report?
report.report_sent_title: Thanks for reporting, we’ll look into this.

step_one.it_is_not_something_you_want_to_see: It is not something you want to see

step_three.are_there_any_posts_that_back_up_this_re: Are there any posts that back up this report?

step_four.is_there_anything_else_we_should_know: Is there anything else we should know?

step_final.when_you_see_something_you_dont_like_on_: When you see something you don’t like on Mastodon, you can remove the person from your experience.
step_final.you_wont_see_their_posts_or_reblogs_in_y: You won’t see their posts or reblogs in your home feed. They won’t know they’ve been muted.
step_final.they_will_no_longer_be_able_to_follow_or: They will no longer be able to follow or see your posts, but they can see if they’ve been blocked.
step_final.while_we_review_this_you_can_take_action: While we review this, you can take action against %s
